mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, serial_number, order_number, approval_status, go_order_number, go_sum_money, go_pname, go_pname_number, back_pname_number, back_sum_money, back_remarks, plus_number, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, creater, updater
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tds_money_approval_back WHERE id=#{id} AND IS_DELETED='0'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tds_money_approval_back
user_id , user_name , serial_number , order_number , approval_status , go_order_number , go_sum_money , go_pname , go_pname_number , back_pname_number , back_sum_money , back_remarks , plus_number , create_time , update_time , creater , updater , is_deleted ,
#{userId} , #{userName} , #{serialNumber} , #{orderNumber} , #{approvalStatus} , #{goOrderNumber} , #{goSumMoney} , #{goPname} , #{goPnameNumber} , #{backPnameNumber} , #{backSumMoney} , #{backRemarks} , #{plusNumber} , #{createTime} , #{updateTime} , #{creater} , #{updater} , #{isDeleted},
mapper.update: UPDATE tds_money_approval_back SET IS_DELETED='1' WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM tds_money_approval_back
AND approval_status = #{approvalStatus} AND create_time >= #{startOrderTime} AND create_time <= #{endOrderTime} AND user_name like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%') AND go_pname like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%') AND id like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%') AND go_order_number like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%')
AND user_name like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%') or go_pname like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%') or id like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%') or go_order_number like concat(concat('%',#{likeName}),'%')
and is_deleted='0'
